author: Justine Coleman
title: Virginia governor issues stay-at-home order in the midst of pandemic
description: Virginia Gov. Ralph Northam (D) issued a stay-at-home order Monday as the coronavirus pandemic continues to spread.In a press conference announcing the order, Northam said people should only leav...
content:
Virginia Gov. Ralph Northam (D) issued a stay-at-home order Monday as the coronavirus pandemic continues to spread.
Northam said people should only leave their homes to obtain food, supplies or medical care, or for exercise. All gatherings of more than 10 pe… [+417 chars]
